<li data-n="8"><a href="race/tour-de-france/2022/gc/more/report">More - Report</a></li><li data-n="8"><a href="race/tour-de-france/2022/gc/more/embed-results">Embed</a></li>

<li data-n="8"><a href="race/tour-de-france/2022/gc/more/contribute-sites">Contribute site(s)</a></li>
</ul></li></ul><div class="clear"></div></div><div class="page-title "><a class="mobileMenuLink showIfMobile menu-toggle" href="">menu</a><div class="main"><span class="flag fr w32"></span><span class="flag fr w24"></span><span class="hideIfMobile">2022</span><span class="hideIfMobile">»</span><font class="hideIfMobile">109th</font><h1 class="">Tour de France</h1><font class="hideIfMobile">(2.UWT)</font></div><div class="sub"><span class="showIfMobile">2022</span><span class="showIfMobile">»</span><span class="blue">Stage 21 <font style="font-weight: normal; ">(Final)</font></span><span class="hideIfMobile">»</span><span class="red">Paris La Défense</span><span class="red">›</span><span class="red">Paris (Champs-Élysées)</span><span class="red fw400">(115.6km)</span></div></div><div class="clear"></div><div class="desktop-ad leaderbord race"></div><div class="mob-ad leaderbord race"></div><div class="top-cont"></div><div class="top-cont-mobile top-cont-mobile-race"></div><div class="page-content page-object default " data-no_menu="0"><h2>Startlist</h2><div class="">
<a style="float: right; font-size: 10px; text-transform: uppercase; color: #aaa; display: block; padding: 3px 7px; " class="showDiv" data-id="pdfOptions" href="">more pdf options</a><div class="hide" data-id="pdfOptions" style="float: right; "><a class="icon pdf" target="_blank" style="margin-left: 6px; " href="pdf/startlist.php?id=268362&amp;option=ucicode">Incl. uci-code</a><a class="icon pdf" target="_blank" style="margin-left: 6px; " href="pdf/startlist.php?id=268362&amp;option=gc">Incl. GC times</a><a class="icon pdf" target="_blank" style="margin-left: 6px; " href="pdf/startlist.php?id=268362&amp;option=flags">Incl. flags</a><a class="icon pdf" target="_blank" style="margin-left: 6px; " href="pdf/startlist.php?id=268362&amp;option=gc,flags">Incl. gc+flags</a><a class="icon pdf" target="_blank" style="margin-left: 6px; " href="pdf/startlist.php?id=268362&amp;option=ext">Shirts+info</a></div><a class="icon pdf" target="_blank" href="pdf/startlist.php?id=268362">Startlist</a><div class="clear"></div><ul class="startlist_v3"><li class="team"><b>1. <span class="icon tick2"></span>  <a href="team/uae-team-emirates-2022">UAE Team Emirates</a></b><br><div style="float: left; "><ul><li>1 <span class="flag si"></span> <a class="blue" href="rider/tadej-pogacar"><span class="">POGAČAR Tadej</span></a>* </li><li>2 <span class="flag nz"></span> <a class="blue" href="rider/george-bennett"><span class="">BENNETT George</span></a> </li><li>3 <span class="flag dk"></span> <a class="blue" href="rider/mikkel-bjerg"><span class="">BJERG Mikkel</span></a>* </li><li>4 <span class="flag no"></span> <a class="blue" href="rider/vegard-stake-laengen"><span class="">LAENGEN Vegard Stake</span></a> </li><li>5 <span class="flag pl"></span> <a class="blue" href="rider/rafal-majka"><span class="">MAJKA Rafał</span></a> </li><li>6 <span class="flag us"></span> <a class="blue" href="rider/brandon-mcnulty"><span class="">MCNULTY Brandon</span></a>* </li><li>7 <span class="flag es"></span> <a class="blue" href="rider/marc-soler"><span class="">SOLER Marc</span></a> </li><li>8 <span class="flag ch"></span> <a class="blue" href="rider/marc-hirschi"><span class="">HIRSCHI Marc</span></a>* </li></ul><div style="font-size: 11px; </div>

line-ups</a></li><li class="" style=" "><a href="race/tour-de-france/2022/gc/startlist/general-peloton-averages">Peloton averages</a></li></ul></li><li><span>Riders</span><ul><li class="" style=" "><a season</a></li><li class="" style=" "><a href="race/tour-de-france/2022/gc/startlist/debutants">Debutants</a></li><li class="" style=" "><a
